魦魦魦

魦字的基本解释

魦
shā
古同“鲨”。

魦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shā］
［《廣韻》所加切，平麻，生。］
亦作“魦1”。亦作“鯋1”。“鲨1”的繁体字。
(1)吹沙鱼。又名鮀。生活在溪涧的小鱼。
(2)一种生活在海中的鳃裂位于侧面的板鳃鱼类的通称。又名沙鱼或鲛。种类很多，性凶猛，捕食其他鱼类。肉可食，肝可制鱼肝油，鳍干制成鱼翅，是名贵食品，皮可制装饰品或刀鞘。

魦字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魦； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第01
【唐韻】【集韻】?所加切，音沙。【說文】魚名。出樂浪潘國。【玉篇】鮫魚。【集韻】與鯊同。今之吹沙小魚是也。【後漢·馬融傳】鰋鯉鱨魦。【註】魦，或作鯊。又【廣韻】【集韻】?蘇禾切，音莎。魚名。或作鮻。又【集韻】失照切，音少。義同。

魦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
魦字的起名意思

暂无。

Fang
Basic explanation of words
Fang
shā
Gu Tong "shark".
Fang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shā]
[The cut added in "Guangyun", plain hemp, raw. ]
Also known as "魦1". Also known as "鯋1". Traditional characters for "Shark 1".
(1) Blowing sand fish. Also known as 鮀. Little fish living in the stream.
(2) A general term for slaty fish with gill slits that live in the sea. Also known as sand fish or mackerel. There are many species, fierce sex, and prey on other fish. The meat is edible, the liver can be made into cod liver oil, the dried fin is made into shark fin, which is a valuable food, and the skin can be made into decorations or scabbards.
Fang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魦; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1466 No. 01
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? The added cut, sound sand. [Said the text] The name of the fish. Le Lang Pan Guo. [Jade articles] mackerel. 【Jiyun】Same as the shark. This is also a small fish that blows sand today. [Later Han·Ma Rong Biography] 鰋Carp 鱨鱨. [Note] 魦, or as a shark. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Su Heqie, Yinsha. The name of the fish. Or as a mullet. Also 【Jiyun】disappeared, with little sound. The same meaning.
Fang
